testcase.name: UCL_Bracket.Edit_pick
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am Authorized user ✅ When I click 'Main menu icon' button ✅ And I click 'UCL Bracket' link ✅ Then I expect to see loading screen ✅ And I expect to see 'UCL Bracket' screen ✅ Given I click 'Edit UCL' button ✅ When I focus 'Quater-finals' section ✅ And I click on second team on each block in 'Quater-finals' column ✅ Then I expect to see that 4 teams are selected ✅ When I swipe to the 'Semi-finals' column ✅ Then I expect to see all the selected commands added ✅ When I click on second teams on both blocks in 'Semi-finals' column ✅ Then I expect to see that 2 teams are selected ✅ When I swipe to the 'Final' column ✅ Then I expect to see all the selected commands added ✅ When I click on second team ✅ Then I expect to see message box 'Your bracket is ready to save!' ✅ When I click 'Save UCL' button ✅ Then I expect to see 'confirmation' popup ✅ And I expect to see 'Your bracket' screen
